Your Complimentary Ticket to Top Virtual AI Event on 27 JUNE Thu. Hello I'm excited to share some complimentary guest tickets (worth US$300 each) for a highly relevant virtual AI event: How to Get Buy-In from Your HODs for Your Organizational AI Guidelines. This masterclass tackles a critical challenge for organizations looking to implement AI. Join us on June 27th! However, despite the high interest in AI, there's often a lack of buy-in and championing from leadership, including founders, CEOs, and C-levels. This event aims to bridge that gap. Misconception 1: "AI is IT" AI is actually the most user-friendly technological revolution, with benefits for everyone from young professionals to senior management. No prior IT skills are required! Misconception 2: "AI is Expensive and Time-Consuming" AI University's bestselling masterclass, "How to Get Buy-In for AI Guidelines," shows how to leverage ChatGPT and Generative AI in just 1-2 hours. Misconception 3: "Senior Managers Resist Generative AI" Our proven track record demonstrates that hands-on experience with ChatGPT and other AI tools quickly converts skeptics into believers. Don't miss out! Date: June 27th (Thu), 2024 Time: 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM Hong Kong-Singapore Time (See your local time zone) Platform: Zoom Virtual Limited Seats Available (1 Free Guest per Organization) Are you available to attend? If not, please consider sending a replacement, ideally an HR or L&D decision-maker. Attending this event grants you automatic eligibility to join the World's Elite AI Network. Register today! https://lnkd.in/gPDnVx6E • Learn more about the Masterclass Outline + Testimonials: https://lnkd.in/gecascsc ~ On behalf of: Robren, Founder, AI University and International AI Association #AI. #chatgpt. #Gemini. #ainetwork. #misconceptions. #masterclass. #it. #headofdepartment. #CLevels

The buzz in the tech sector about generative AI has many companies pondering: Should we pivot our positioning and messaging to ride this wave? As someone deeply invested in the intersection of technology and strategy, I want to share some thoughts that might help guide this decision. 🤖 Gen AI: trend or transformation? Generative AI isn't just a fleeting trend; it's a transformative technology reshaping how we think about data, creativity, and automation. But here's the catch: while it's tempting to jump on the bandwagon, it's crucial to approach this with a strategic mindset. 🎯 Integrating AI into your value proposition AI is an enabling technology, not a market in itself. The key question is: How can generative AI enhance your existing products or services? The goal is to integrate AI into your offerings in a way that amplifies their value and aligns with what your customers truly care about. 💡 Avoiding the hype trap It's easy to get caught up in the hype and force a trend onto a product that doesn’t naturally fit. This can lead to confusion and dilute your core messaging. Instead, focus on how AI can genuinely improve your product's functionality or user experience. 🌐 Practical steps for tech companies: ✅ Evaluate the fit: Assess how generative AI aligns with your current offerings. Does it enhance your product’s core capabilities? ✅ Understand your audience: Will your customers benefit from AI integration? It's not just about what's technologically possible, but what's practically beneficial. ✅ Update messaging thoughtfully: If AI adds real value, update your messaging to reflect this. Highlight the benefits, not just the technology. 🔍 In conclusion: Generative AI offers exciting possibilities, but it's essential to stay true to your brand's core value and market position. Let's not just follow a trend for the sake of it; let's make sure it makes sense for our products, our customers, and our market. I'm curious to hear your thoughts. How are you approaching the generative AI trend in your business strategy? #AI #TechTrends #BusinessStrategy #ProductPositioning #Innovation #chatgpt #growthmarketing

𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗔𝗜'𝘀 𝗔𝘃𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗿-𝗜𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗚𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝘁𝘀: 𝗟𝗲𝘁'𝘀 𝗧𝗮𝗹𝗸 𝗦𝘁𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗴𝘆 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝐓𝐋;𝐃𝐑 CharacterAI's move represents a milestone in human-to-AI interaction, blending educational and entertainment elements into our social fabrics. It's like having a virtual Ronaldo, Einstein, or Zeus in your group chat to pep things up! 𝐃𝐞𝐞𝐩 𝐃𝐢𝐯𝐞 1️⃣ 𝑨𝑰 𝑪𝒉𝒂𝒓𝒂𝒄𝒕𝒆𝒓 𝑽𝒆𝒓𝒔𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒍𝒊𝒕𝒚 - Imagine discussing relativity theory with Einstein or Greek mythology with Zeus. This feature adds a layer of depth to otherwise mundane chats. 2️⃣ 𝑹𝒆𝒗𝒆𝒏𝒖𝒆 𝑴𝒐𝒅𝒆𝒍 - $1.3M/mo from in-app purchases is nothing to scoff at. This could be a cue for AI Devs —think AI-powered characters integrated into educational platforms or workshops. A hint of celebrity, whether historic or mythical, could spark user engagement and potentially boost revenue. 𝟑️⃣ 𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝐓𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐝 - Snapchat, Meta, and now CharacterAI. The momentum is building for AI integration in social experiences, signaling both opportunities and challenges. 🎯 𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬 - 𝑼𝒔𝒆𝒓 𝑬𝒏𝒈𝒂𝒈𝒆𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕: The idea of engaging with AI avatars could be extended into your educational content. Imagine a virtual classroom with AI personalities contributing to the discussion. - 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒖𝒏𝒊𝒕𝒚 𝑩𝒖𝒊𝒍𝒅𝒊𝒏𝒈: An AI-enhanced community could attract more users who are interested in the hybrid social experience. Perfect for workshops and webinars. - 𝑷𝒓𝒐𝒅𝒖𝒄𝒕 𝑫𝒊𝒇𝒇𝒆𝒓𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒊𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏: In a crowded market, having a unique feature like this can set you apart. ☕ 𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐢𝐩 𝐼𝑡'𝑠 𝑙𝑖𝑘𝑒 ℎ𝑎𝑣𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑣𝑒𝑟𝑦 𝑜𝑤𝑛 "𝐶𝑜𝑓𝑓𝑒𝑒 𝐻𝑜𝑢𝑠𝑒 𝑜𝑓 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑀𝑖𝑛𝑑," 𝑤ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑝𝑎𝑡𝑟𝑜𝑛𝑠 𝑟𝑎𝑛𝑔𝑒 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 ℎ𝑖𝑠𝑡𝑜𝑟𝑖𝑐 𝑙𝑢𝑚𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑟𝑖𝑒𝑠 𝑡𝑜 𝑚𝑦𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑐𝑎𝑙 𝑔𝑜𝑑𝑠. 𝐻𝑜𝑤𝑒𝑣𝑒𝑟, 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑒𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑐𝑎𝑙 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑠𝑜𝑐𝑖𝑎𝑙 𝑖𝑚𝑝𝑙𝑖𝑐𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛𝑠 𝑡ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑐𝑎𝑛'𝑡 𝑏𝑒 𝑖𝑔𝑛𝑜𝑟𝑒𝑑. 𝐵𝑎𝑙𝑎𝑛𝑐𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑐𝑜𝑜𝑙 𝑓𝑎𝑐𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑤𝑖𝑡ℎ 𝑡ℎ𝑒 "𝑐𝑟𝑒𝑒𝑝" 𝑓𝑎𝑐𝑡𝑜𝑟 𝑤𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑏𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑔𝑎𝑚𝑒 𝑡𝑜 𝑤𝑎𝑡𝑐ℎ. 𝑊ℎ𝑎𝑡'𝑠 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑡𝑎𝑘𝑒—𝑐𝑜𝑜𝑙 𝑜𝑟 𝑐𝑟𝑒𝑒𝑝𝑦? #UnlockAI with AI Savvy

🚨 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐰𝐚𝐭𝐜𝐡-𝐨𝐮𝐭! 𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 #𝐀𝐈 𝐭𝐨 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐨𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐦𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐝𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 1𝐬𝐭 𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐜𝐞 👇 OK - we all agree that generative AI should be on every corporate’s agenda Most discussions today are still around tools like ChatGPT and fancy use cases 🤑 One central aspect is too often not in focus: Human behavior and existing ways of working in your organization 👩💻 Because let’s be honest here: A) Will you take time to make your organization future proof and #AI ready? OR B) Will you fix it on the fly and bring in a Tier 1 consultancy to drive the transformation? I’m not gonna answer this 😂 but instead will directly jump into Boston Consulting Group (BCG) Generative AI study together with Harvard Business School My Top 5: 1️⃣ When generative AI is used in creative ideation, 90% of participants increased performance 2️⃣ When working on business problem solving, performance decreased by 23% when generative AI is used 3️⃣ Even participants who were warned about the possibility of wrong answers from the tool did not challenge its output 4️⃣ Uniform output from AI reduces group’s diversity by 41% 5️⃣ Think critically about which tasks can benefit from or be damaged by generative AI ⚠️ We need to find a rewarding way to keep thinking out of the box a significant value for the future. High performance matters! Any thoughts how we can make it happen 💭 Tim Jäger Nico Breidenbach VJ Bala Raquel Torres González Chandana Fitzgerald Gloria Seibert PD Dr. med Benjamin Friedrich #AI #innovation https://lnkd.in/es29wuqe

If the end goal is to find the perfect AI tool, then you are missing the poin🚫 It is about creating workflows that allow AI to become your ultimate creative collaborator. Here is my 5-Step Framework to Achieve Strategic AI Integration 1. Audit Your Creative Process: - Review your current creative workflows and identify the tasks that can benefit from AI integration. - Determine areas where automation could save time and repetitive work. 2. Select Relevant AI Tools: - Research and test a range of AI tools designed for creative work. - Prioritize tools that align with your specific needs and can seamlessly integrate into your current processes. 3. Build Custom AI Workflows: - Design a tailored AI workflow that complements your team's strengths and automates routine tasks. - Start with smaller tasks to familiarize the team with the technology, gradually expanding to more complex projects. 4. Foster a Culture of Experimentation: - Encourage team members to experiment with new tools and share their findings. - Set up collaborative sessions to explore innovative ways to blend human creativity with AI-generated insights. 5. Monitor and Refine: - Regularly assess the performance and impact of AI in your creative process. - Collect feedback from stakeholders and team members to improve workflows, ensuring the integration remains aligned with your goals. This should help you get a strang foundation and help you scale your creative process and improve overall ROI🚀 How are you integrating AI to enhance your creativity and lead innovation in your industry? -- Enjoy this? ♻️ Repost it to your network and follow Sachin Kamath↗️for more. Want latest AI trends and updates along with proven systems for creatives? Join our community of 5,000+ subscribers today: https://lnkd.in/dvPzKBXX #ai #generativeai #leonardoai #chatgpt #midjourney #aimusic #aianimation #canva

🚀 AI Workshops at CES 2024 As we approach the wind down to the year, we're thrilled to share a fantastic opportunity awaiting you in the new year. Join us at CES in Las Vegas this January for exclusive AI workshops, tailored for brands eager to integrate AI into their marketing strategies. Here's a sneak peek into what we have lined up: - AI Planning Session: - Educational Workshops: - Private ChatGPT Setup & Training: These workshops are not just about learning; they're about applying AI in practical, impactful ways. And yes, spots are limited! If you're planning to be at CES and want to transform how your business leverages AI, this is your chance. Reach out to us to book your spot, and let's make 2023 an incredible year of AI-driven growth together. 🌟 See you in Vegas! #ces2024 #ai #advertising

👉🏻 Feel you’re getting left behind on all things AI? 👉🏻 Are your teams overwhelmed by it? 👉🏻 Does your organisation want to use it but you’re unsure where to start? 👉🏻 Do you have AI guilt as it feels like everyone is using it other than you? *We got you!* ❤️ Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming our world as we know it and there is no doubt it will become an integral part of our professional lives. Forward-thinking organisations are embracing the benefits AI brings to their people and performance and enabling their teams to use it confidently. We’re helping them do this by simplifying the complexity around Generative AI. Following the success of our ‘AI for the Average Joe’ podcast series, our new, engaging and interactive programme provides practical training to help organisations get started – by enabling an understanding of digital ethics, supporting managers to coach the required behaviours, and providing the experience for teams to build the underpinning skills. Our upcoming virtual event “How to use Gen AI in the workplace” presents innovative techniques, interactive training and expert knowledge to help you work confidently with Generative AI. Using the Quantum Rise engagement methodology and enabling you to use AI live online, we explore how you can use AI to reduce time, improve outcomes and be more productive. By the end of the event, you will: • Understand what Generative AI is and how you can use it to engage with your clients, team and organisation. • Know practical prompts to get the best out of AI apps, saving you time and effort. • Recognise the wider opportunities available by using Generative AI • Have an insight into our new, interactive programme that provides the knowledge you need to embed Generative AI in your workplace. • And you will use ChatGPT and Gamma AI live in the session as well as taking away the recording. Our interactive virtual event takes place on Tuesday, 5th December 10:30-12:00 GMT UK – places are limited. ⭐️ Book on Eventbrite here 👉🏻 https://lnkd.in/eEmCrvY7 #ai #artificalintelligence #learninganddevelopment #workplaceskills #genai #futureskills
